arStrings.szText: Locations on the Map {hotkey:map} marked with {icon:Purchased_Icon_New, 2.2}  contain new purchased items.
Purchased armor, weapon and other character cosmetics are found in the {icon:Marker_Wardrobe, 2.2} Wardrobe.
Purchased mounts and mount cosmetics are found in the {icon:Marker_Vendor_Stable, 2.5} Stable.
Purchased emotes are found when editing the {icon:Store_Icon_Wheel, 2.0} Action Wheel.
